duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and analyze customer documents related to new account origination and deposit accounts based on laws and bank policy.
Provide support to Retail personnel and various business units throughout the Bank.
Analyze and review customer documents based on account ownership and applicable state law.
Participate in retirement account administration and HSA account transactions.
Assist with the review and disposition of decedent accounts.
Perform document review for Medallion Signature Guarantee.
Complete daily and monthly functions supporting account data review in the bank core system.
Maintain current knowledge of federal and state laws and regulations, and the Bank's policies and procedures.
Keep management informed of department activities and significant problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred)
